snippet: You know that Pedro Reyes’s political house of horrors in the Brooklyn Army Terminal is theater, but some acts make your pulse jump and disarm your defenses....
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews artist-activist Pedro Reyes performance piece Doomocracy, presented by nonprofit Creative Time, at Brooklyn Army Terminal.
lead_paragraph: You know that Pedro Reyes’s political house of horrors in the Brooklyn Army Terminal is theater, but some acts make your pulse jump and disarm your defenses.

headline.print_headline: Fright Night in Brooklyn: The Election Edition
headline.main: At ‘Doomocracy,’ It’s Fright Night in Brooklyn
